allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: CAMI v0.2.0 - Claude Agent Management Interface

CAMI is a comprehensive agent deployment and management system for Claude Code,
featuring both CLI/TUI and MCP server interfaces.

Core Features:
- Agent Management: 23 version-controlled specialized agents
- CLI Commands: deploy, list, scan, update-docs, location management
- MCP Server: 7 tools for seamless Claude Code integration
- TUI Interface: Interactive Bubble Tea-based terminal UI
- Documentation: Comprehensive guides and reference materials

Components:
- cmd/cami/: CLI/TUI application entry point
- cmd/cami-mcp/: MCP server implementation
- internal/: Core packages (agent, cli, config, deploy, discovery, docs, tui)
- vc-agents/: 23 specialized agents (architect, backend, frontend, devops, etc.)
- reference/: Detailed documentation and development guides

Agents Include:
- Development: architect, backend, frontend, mobile-native, game-dev
- Operations: devops, deploy, terminal-specialist, embedded-systems
- Specialized: ai-ml-specialist, blockchain-specialist, data-engineer
- Quality: qa, security-specialist, performance-optimizer, accessibility-expert
- Integration: api-integrator, mcp-specialist, gcp-firebase
- Design: designer, ux, docs-writer, agent-architect

MCP Tools:
- list_agents, list_locations, scan_deployed_agents
- deploy_agents, update_claude_md
- add_location, remove_location

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
